domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @Mike_Pence That’s why you’re hiding data on the coronavirus to fast track reopening of schools, right? Because you care about human life more than re-election prospects? If there’s a hell, surely you’ve punched your one-way ticket there by siding with this president...
